Enumeration Type Documentation

enum imByteOrder

CPU Byte Orders.

Enumerator:
IM_LITTLEENDIAN 

Little Endian - The most significant byte is on the right end of a word. Used by Intel processors.

IM_BIGENDIAN 

Big Endian - The most significant byte is on the left end of a word. Used by Motorola processors, also is the network standard byte order. 

{
  IM_LITTLEENDIAN, /**< Little Endian - The most significant byte is on the right end of a word. Used by Intel processors. */
  IM_BIGENDIAN     /**< Big Endian - The most significant byte is on the left end of a word. Used by Motorola processors, also is the network standard byte order. */
};
